# C3 Context: Acme Platform

## System Overview

**Name:** Acme Platform
**Type:** E-commerce Platform
**Tech Stack:** Turborepo monorepo, TypeScript

## Purpose

Acme Platform is an e-commerce platform that provides:
- Customer-facing storefront for browsing and purchasing products
- Backend API for product catalog and order management
- Shared UI components and API client utilities

## System Boundary

```
+------------------+     +-------------------+
|                  |     |                   |
|    Customers     |---->|   Acme Platform   |
|   (Web Browsers) |     |                   |
|                  |     +-------------------+
+------------------+              |
                                  v
                         +-------------------+
                         |                   |
                         |     Database      |
                         |                   |
                         +-------------------+
```

## External Dependencies

| Dependency | Purpose | Interface |
|------------|---------|-----------|
| Database | Product & order persistence | Prisma-like client |

## Monorepo Structure

| Path | Package | Type | Purpose |
|------|---------|------|---------|
| apps/web | @acme/web | Application | Next.js storefront |
| apps/api | @acme/api | Application | Hono API server |
| packages/ui | @acme/ui | Library | Shared React components |
| packages/api-client | @acme/api-client | Library | API client for frontend |
| packages/database | @acme/database | Library | Database client wrapper |

## Key Decisions

- **Monorepo:** Turborepo for managing workspaces with shared packages
- **Frontend:** Next.js 14 with React 18
- **Backend:** Hono for lightweight, fast API server (runs on Bun)
- **Shared Code:** Internal packages for UI, API client, and database access

## Containers Overview

```
+--------------------------------------------------+

|                                                   |
|  +-------------+          +------------------+   |
|  |             |   HTTP   |                  |   |
|  |   Web App   |--------->|    API Server    |   |
|  |  (Next.js)  |          |     (Hono)       |   |
|  |             |          |                  |   |
|  +-------------+          +------------------+   |
|        |                          |              |
|        | uses                     | uses         |
|        v                          v              |

|  |             |          |                  |   |

|  +-------------+          +------------------+   |
|        ^                          |              |
|        |                          | connects     |
|  +-------------+                  v              |
|  |             |          +------------------+   |
|  | API Client  |          |                  |   |
|  |             |          |    Database      |   |
|  +-------------+          |    (External)    |   |
|                           |                  |   |
+--------------------------------------------------+
```

## Container Details

### c3-0: Web Application

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **ID** | c3-0 |
| **Name** | Web Application |
| **Package** | @acme/web |
| **Path** | apps/web |
| **Technology** | Next.js 14, React 18 |
| **Purpose** | Customer-facing storefront |
| **Entry Point** | src/app/page.tsx |

**Dependencies:**
- @acme/ui (internal)
- @acme/api-client (internal)

---

### c3-1: API Server

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **ID** | c3-1 |
| **Name** | API Server |
| **Package** | @acme/api |
| **Path** | apps/api |
| **Technology** | Hono, Bun |
| **Purpose** | REST API for products and orders |
| **Entry Point** | src/index.ts |

**Dependencies:**
- @acme/database (internal)

**Endpoints:**
| Method | Path | Purpose |
|--------|------|---------|
| GET | /products | List all products |
| GET | /products/:id | Get product by ID |
| POST | /orders | Create new order |

---

### c3-2: UI Library

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **ID** | c3-2 |
| **Name** | UI Component Library |
| **Package** | @acme/ui |
| **Path** | packages/ui |
| **Technology** | React 18 |
| **Purpose** | Shared UI components |
| **Entry Point** | src/index.ts |

**Exports:**
- Button
- Card
- Input

---

### c3-3: API Client

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **ID** | c3-3 |
| **Name** | API Client |
| **Package** | @acme/api-client |
| **Path** | packages/api-client |
| **Technology** | TypeScript, Fetch API |
| **Purpose** | Type-safe API client for frontend |
| **Entry Point** | src/index.ts |

**API Methods:**
- `api.products.list()` - Fetch all products
- `api.products.get(id)` - Fetch single product
- `api.orders.create(items)` - Create order

---

### c3-4: Database Client

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **ID** | c3-4 |
| **Name** | Database Client |
| **Package** | @acme/database |
| **Path** | packages/database |
| **Technology** | TypeScript (Prisma-style) |
| **Purpose** | Database access layer |
| **Entry Point** | src/index.ts |

**Models:**
- `db.product` - Product queries
- `db.order` - Order mutations

```
@acme/web ──────> @acme/ui
    │
    └──────────> @acme/api-client ──HTTP──> @acme/api
                                                │
                                                v
                                          @acme/database
                                                │
                                                v
                                          [External DB]
```

## Components

### c3-4.0: Product Model

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **ID** | c3-4.0 |
| **File** | src/index.ts |
| **Type** | Data Model |
| **Purpose** | Product data access |

**Methods:**
| Method | Signature | Description |
|--------|-----------|-------------|
| `findMany()` | `() => Promise<Product[]>` | List all products |
| `findUnique({ where })` | `({ where: { id } }) => Promise<Product>` | Get product by ID |

**Schema:**
```typescript
interface Product {
  id: string;
  name: string;
  price: number;
}
```

---

### c3-4.1: Order Model

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **ID** | c3-4.1 |
| **File** | src/index.ts |
| **Type** | Data Model |
| **Purpose** | Order data access |

**Methods:**
| Method | Signature | Description |
|--------|-----------|-------------|
| `create({ data })` | `({ data }) => Promise<Order>` | Create new order |

**Schema:**
```typescript
interface Order {
  id: string;
  items: OrderItem[];
}

interface OrderItem {
  productId: string;
  quantity: number;
}
```

## Usage

```typescript
import { db } from "@acme/database";

// Query products
const products = await db.product.findMany();
const product = await db.product.findUnique({ where: { id: "1" } });

// Create order
const order = await db.order.create({
  data: {
    items: [{ productId: "1", quantity: 2 }]
  }
});
```
